abstract: NFL Roundup; Green Bay Packers quarterback Aaron Rodgers wins 2014 Most Valuable Player Award and Houston Texans defensive end J J Watt takes top defensive honors.
lead_paragraph: Green Bay’s Rodgers won his second Most Valuable Player Award, and Watt swept away the voters the way he sweeps quarterbacks off their feet to take top defensive honors.

headline.main: M.V.P. Goes to Aaron Rodgers; J. J. Watt Wins for Defense
headline.print_headline: M.V.P. Goes to Rodgers; Watt Wins for Defense

snippet: Green Bay’s Rodgers won his second Most Valuable Player Award, and Watt swept away the voters the way he sweeps quarterbacks off their feet to take top defensive honors.
